sourcesContent:
Username
Password
Name is required.
login: {{this.login}} password: {{this.password}} import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LocalService } from '../local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign', templateUrl: './sign.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign.component.css'] }) export class SignComponent { constructor (private localStore: LocalService) {} login : string = ''; password : string = ''; createNewUser () : void { if (this.localStore.getData(this.login) == null) { // can create a new user; if (this.login != '' && this.password != '') { this.localStore.saveData(this.login, this.password); alert('you signed up!'); } } else { // user already in store so alert alert('login already used'); } } }
